text: "Johnny and Mary" is a 1980 song by Robert Palmer. It was taken from his sixth studio album Clues. It went to number 44 in the United Kingdom and was a Top 40 hit in New Zealand, Austria, Australia, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium and Canada. It topped the single charts in Spain. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Synth-pop songs Category:Electropop songs Category:Robert Palmer songs Category:Placebo (band) songs
title: Johnny and Mary
